issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Strong supporter of the Affordable Care Act, advocates for protecting and expanding healthcare coverage

issues.title: Women's Health
issues.description: Pro-choice advocate, supports reproductive rights and funding for women's health services

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Supports stricter gun control measures, including background checks and assault weapon restrictions

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Supports green energy initiatives and reducing carbon emissions, advocates for environmental protection

issues.title: Education
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, student loan reform, and affordable higher education

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants

issues.title: LGBTQ+ Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of LGBTQ+ equality, advocates for anti-discrimination protections

issues.title: Economic Policy
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, protecting workers' rights, and middle-class economic initiatives
